评论详情: My son will love it when he gets it on Wednesday.  That is all I heard him say he wanted was a Chief keef hoodie.

Looks nothing like the pictures. No embroidery and the material is ok at best. Overall it looks ok, but not at all how it looks in the pictures. Also, description is a bit misleading. Very disappointing!

I don’t dislike any particular thing about the hoodie. I don’t understand the gothic symbols so I pray it is not demonisk. It is a requested birthday gift for my great grandson who’s birthday is next month.
Wore once and zipper came apart
material is ass, who wants a zip up hoodie w silk material.. thought it would be cotton like the pictures
This hoodie is so comfortable and fits like a glove, I really needed this because it gets really cold and the full zip is just a bonus.Also love the design.
The design is good, but the material is thin and bathing suit material. It’s not thick like shown in the pictures.
